name: SimpleCounter
0:
”Alexa, Start Simple Counter and count 10.”
”Alexa, Start Simple Counter and count down 8.”
”Alexa, Start Simple Counter and count to 10.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple counter
des: The purpose of this simple counter is to help keep track of repetitions as we exercise or perform any activity that needs a simple counter. This counter by default will count up to a specified number. You can instruct it to count down also.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
